channel.title: Hmm
channel.description: Any of you know if it's possible to just run java and not your operating system, for optimal performance? It would be cool if you could because then you'd be able to write a OS entirely of java. :D??????

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“PeeHPee, post:13, topic:356406”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=452942.msg3318969#msg3318969 date=1282538937]
Seeing as how you use an operating system to run java.exe, I’d love to see you try and make a real operating system with it.
[/quote]

[quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=452942.msg3318481#msg3318481 date=1282506419]
http://www.jnode.org/
But this is definately slower than any other normal os.

Solaris without a GUI is probably a good os to run java applications because sun probably have made some optimizations.
[/quote][/quote]

JNode is a free, open source Java technology based operating system implemented in the Java language with a very small assembler nano-kernel.
It’s not the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:

Seeing as how you use an operating system to run java.exe, I’d love to see you try and make a real operating system with it.
[/quote]

[quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=452942.msg3318481#msg3318481 date=1282506419]
http://www.jnode.org/
But this is definately slower than any other normal os.

Solaris without a GUI is probably a good os to run java applications because sun probably have made some optimizations.
[/quote][/quote]Umm, thanks for sticking up for me, but that runs on Linux, at least I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:5, topic:356406”]http://www.jnode.org/
But this is definately slower than any other normal os.

Solaris without a GUI is probably a good os to run java applications because sun probably have made some optimizations.[/quote]Wow, nice!

Evil_:

Surely to god you’re just trolling…

I wrote my thoughts out wrong, I meant is it possible to not have the Graphical User Interface on W/E operating system just for an applet to run? <- don’t answer, Fat Cookies already did.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“austinsobes, post:10, topic:356406”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=452942.msg3318552#msg3318552 date=1282511582]
run a batch file with these contents, it’s easy!

@echo off
echo switching off os so you can be a java expert!
del C:\
pause

[/quote]

Isn’t that the same thing as giving you a virus? That condones the use of virus making, and using your own stupidity to give yourself a virus.[/quote]Its not a virus, just one who would make that and then run it is just stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:4, topic:356406”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=452942.msg3318281#msg3318281 date=1282492783]
Ya bro, it’s really easy. First you have to download the jdk installer and save it to a cd. Then you have to reformat your hard drive (to get rid of your current os ofc). Then you put the cd in, and tell your BIOS to boot from cd.
[/quote]

I tried that before and it worked![/quote]
It worked for me too!

Read full topic
